observation: Navigating to http://www.allinvmgt.com/ returned status code 200

thought: The website is accessible, so I will proceed to extract the text and check for any suspicious characteristics.
observation: Allison Investment Management, LLC | An unwavering commitment to our clients' prosperity and the highest ethical standards  Home Management Team Media View Your Account Request Info Locate Us Select Page Allison Investment Management, LLC is a family owned private wealth management firm. We offer separately managed accounts to high-net-worth individuals whose investment portfolios exceed $500,000. Our firm was built on the belief that investors deserve a higher level of professionalism, ethical standards, and portfolio customization than what is offered by the conventional financial advisor/client relationship. Our business model offers you direct access to the person who is responsible for making the investment decisions in your portfolio. There are no third party investment advisers or pre-packaged investment portfolios involved in our investment process. Your direct relationship with us increases trust and communication, offers a higher level of personal service, and produces an investment portfolio that is highly customized around your specific financial needs. Columbia Office 1201 Lincoln Street, Suite 301 PH: 803-806-8400 EM: john@allinvmgt.com Wrightsville Beach Office 10 Marina Street, Unit 3B PH: 910-509-7142 david@allinvmgt.com Advisory services offered through Allison Investment Management, LLC. Securities Offered through Triad Advisors, LLC. Member FINRA SIPC Allison Investment Management, LLC is a Registered Investment Adviser and is not affiliated with Triad Advisors, LLC. Â© Allison Investment Management, LLC. All Rights Reserved
